text: “The biggest threat to humanity from AI isn’t AI itself - it’s greed.”
author: gary

text:
The biggest unknown in the AI space is when we will build systems that reliably reason and fact check their own work.

Once we can do that, adoption will quickly follow.
author: gary

text: Fun fact: Elon has filed more lawsuits this week than I have in my entire life.
author: gary

text:
prediction: the o3 arc will go something like:

1. "oh damn it's smarter than me, this changes everything ahhhh"

<ten minutes pass>

2. "so what's for dinner, anyway?"

<ten minutes pass>

3. "can you believe how bad o3 is? and slow? they need to hurry up and ship o4.”
author: sam

text: obviously we need the ai to find the aliens bro

text: i expect ai to be capable of superhuman persuasion well before it is superhuman at general intelligence, which may lead to some very strange outcomes
author: sam

text: we definitely need more regulation on ai
